long_description: A soft pair of shorts with a 7 in. inseam for extra coverage, the men's Icebreaker Sonic Shorts keep you comfortable during the run thanks to the smooth, natural feel of merino wool. Lightweight merino wool jersey fabric in shorts and liner offers high performance with natural stretch, and its smooth surface enhances comfort. Fabric wicks moisture and dries quickly, and you won't have to worry about traditional odors associated with workout clothing because merino wool resists odors naturally. Mesh side panels ventilate to enhance breathability. Elastic waistband with drawcord secures the fit; internal pocket stores a key or ID; reflective logo. The men's Icebreaker Sonic Shorts with 7 in. inseam are machine washable.
